User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the Personalized Learning Nexus platform.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile photo.

creationTime.description: The date and time the user was created.

lastSignInTime.description: The date and time the user last signed in.

LearningMaterial.title: LearningMaterial
LearningMaterial.description: Represents a piece of learning material (e.g., a document, video, or article).

id.description: Unique identifier for the learning material.

contentUrl.description: URL where the learning material can be accessed.

summary.description: A summarized version of the content.

keywords.description: Keywords associated with the learning material.

Quiz.title: Quiz
Quiz.description: Represents a quiz generated based on learning materials.

questions.description: Array of questions in the quiz.

createdAt.description: The date and time the quiz was created.

StudyPlan.title: StudyPlan
StudyPlan.description: Represents a personalized study plan for a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the study plan.

learningMaterialIds.description: References to LearningMaterials. (Relationship: StudyPlan N:N LearningMaterial)

startDate.description: Start date of the study plan.

endDate.description: End date of the study plan.

UserQuizAttempt.title: UserQuizAttempt
UserQuizAttempt.description: Represents a user's attempt at a quiz.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user quiz attempt.

attemptTime.description: Date and time of the quiz attempt.

answers.description: Array of user's answers to the quiz questions.

score.description: The score achieved in the quiz attempt.

ContentSummary.title: ContentSummary
ContentSummary.description: Represents a summary of content generated for a user on a specific topic.

userId.description: The ID of the user who generated the summary.

topic.description: The topic of the summarized content.

createdAt.description: The date and time the summary was created.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore data structure has been updated to move quizzes into a subcollection of the user document (`/users/{userId}/quizzes/{quizId}`). This change resolves persistent security rule errors by simplifying authorization. Access to a user's quizzes is now implicitly controlled by access to the parent user document, making security rules more robust and easier to manage. This path-based ownership model is more secure and scalable than relying on query-based rules for the top-level `/quizzes` collection. Other collections remain as they were, following principles of authorization independence and clear ownership.
